channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft .NET Framework 4.6, 4.6.1, 4.6.2, and 4.7
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft .NET Framework 4.6, 4.6.1, 4.6.2, and 4.7

item.title: CVE-2017-8585|2024-08-05T16:41:23.705Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20.net%20framework%204.6%2C%204.6.1%2C%204.6.2%2C%20and%204.7
item.description: Microsoft .NET Framework 4.6, 4.6.1, 4.6.2, and 4.7 allow an attacker to send specially crafted requests to a .NET web application, resulting in denial of service, aka .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability.
